mapper.select:
select ot.id, ot.organization, ot.organization_parent, otp.organization_name as parent_name, ot.organization_name, ot.organization_scope from t_organization ot left join t_organization otp on otp.organization = ot.organization_parent
ot.organization_parent = #{organization}

select ot.id, ot.organization, ot.organization_parent, otp.organization_name as parent_name, ot.organization_name, ot.organization_scope from t_organization ot left join t_organization otp on otp.organization = ot.organization_parent
ot.organization_parent = #{organization}

select op.id, op.organization, op.organization_parent, op.organization_name, op.organization_desc, op.organization_innerphone, op.organization_outerphone, op.organization_address, op.create_time, op.modify_time, op.create_user, op.organization_scope, opt.organization as parent_no, opt.organization_name as parent_name from t_organization op left join t_organization opt on op.organization_parent = opt.organization
op.id = #{id}
